data.name: labelMode.Help
data.value: Select module mode from the list.

data.name: labelEduLevels.Help
data.value: Check educational levels the module should display in the 'Teachers by edu. program' mode.

data.name: labelShowAllTeachers.Help
data.value: If checked, module will also show teachers without associated disciplines. This option will be used in the 'Teachers by edu. program' mode only.
